H0.text: what did the scientist chadwick discovered. Proton

H1.text: what did the scientist chadwick discovered. Electron

H2.text: what did the scientist chadwick discovered. Positron

H3.text: what did the scientist chadwick discovered. Neutron

A4.text: Chadwick sent a letter to Nature titled 'Possible Existence of a Neutron' in February 1932.

A5.text: Sir James Chadwick was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1935 for his discovery of the neutron.
